channel.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
channel.description:
Okay, So I get 2 errors whilst trying to run my PHP file. They're listed below in CODE Tags. Errors:
Strict Standards: Only variables should be passed by reference 23:59:27 - [FINE] [1] > New Client Connected Warning: mysql_num_rows() expects parameter 1 to be resource
Lines of code in which errors are being thrown: : Line 89:[CODE]$this->users[] = new xatUser(socket_accept($this->socket), $this);[/CODE] Line 152:[CODE]$success = (bool) mysql_num_rows($q = $this->mysql->query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode(htmlspecialchars($this->getAttribute($c2, "username")))) . "' AND password=PASSWORD('" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode($this->getAttribute($c2, "password"))) . "') LIMIT 1;"));[/CODE]

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @Tr7 Tr7
item.description:
@Tr7 wrote:

Thanks, it should be fixed now. I just need to put it online and I should be able to login 100% without any problems now

Read full topic

@justaguy wrote:

Tr7:

It also started spamming the console with: “New client connected” as if people were continuously logging in.

Fix the query problem then see what happens.

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Then store the result of the socket_accept() function into a variable and pass it into the constructor.
[code=php]$isSockAccepted = socket_accept($this->socket); $this->users[] = new xatUser($isSockAccepted, $this);[/code]
First you need to take $q out of the mysql_num_rows() function, and after it, make a call to var_dump().
[code=php]$q = $this->mysql->query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode(htmlspecialchars($this->getAttribute($c2, "username")))) . "' AND password=PASSWORD('" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode($this->getAttribute($c2, "password"))) . "') LIMIT 1;"); var_dump($q);[/code] Tell me what var_dump() outputs.

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @Tr7 Tr7
item.description:
@Tr7 wrote:

No idea how to do any of what you’re saying. I’m new to PHP, sorry if I am a pain.

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“Tr7, post:3, topic:461450”]For your first statement, yes, I believe xatUser does, but I am unsure what to do their to fix the error.

And how would I check the “value” of $q?[/quote]

Then store the result of the socket_accept() function into a variable and pass it into the constructor.

First you need to take $q out of the mysql_num_rows() function, and after it, make a call to var_dump().

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Does the xatUser constructor require the first parameter to be passed by reference?
For your second error, check what the value of $q is. I don’t recommend you leave the code like that though, it looks extremely messy and hard to read.

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP/MySQL] Help needed - 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @Tr7 Tr7
item.description:
@Tr7 wrote:

Okay, So I get 2 errors whilst trying to run my PHP file. They’re listed below in CODE Tags.

Errors:

Strict Standards: Only variables should be passed by reference 23:59:27 - [FINE] [1] > New Client Connected

Warning: mysql_num_rows() expects parameter 1 to be resource


Lines of code in which errors are being thrown:
:
Line 89:$this->users[] = new xatUser(socket_accept($this->socket), $this);
Line 152:$success = (bool) mysql_num_rows($q = $this->mysql->query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode(htmlspecialchars($this->getAttribute($c2, "username")))) . "' AND password=PASSWORD('" . $this->mysql->escape(urldecode($this->getAttribute($c2, "password"))) . "') LIMIT 1;"));
